mapper.insert: insert into repertory_apply (apply_id, branch_id, my_team_id, branch_name, create_date, accept_date, proposer_id, proposer_name, approver_id, approver_name, apply_status, apply_remark, apply_code) values (#{applyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{branchId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{myTeamId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{branchName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{acceptDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{proposerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{proposerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{approverId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{approverName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{applyStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{applyRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{applyCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

update repertory_apply
apply_id = #{record.applyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

my_team_id = #{record.myTeamId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
branch_name = #{record.branchName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update repertory_apply
branch_id = #{branchId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
my_team_id = #{myTeamId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
branch_name = #{branchName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
accept_date = #{acceptDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
proposer_id = #{proposerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
proposer_name = #{proposerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
approver_id = #{approverId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
approver_name = #{approverName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

apply_remark = #{applyRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
apply_code = #{applyCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where apply_id = #{applyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update repertory_apply set branch_id = #{branchId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, my_team_id = #{myTeamId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, branch_name = #{branchName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, accept_date = #{acceptDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, proposer_id = #{proposerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, proposer_name = #{proposerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, approver_id = #{approverId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, approver_name = #{approverName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, apply_status = #{applyStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT}, apply_remark = #{applyRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, apply_code = #{applyCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where apply_id = #{applyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: SELECT user_id approver_id,user_name approver_name FROM (SELECT u.user_id,u.user_name,u.my_team_id,qpr.permission_id FROM user u INNER JOIN position_permission_re ppr ON ppr.position_id = u.position_id INNER JOIN qm_permission_re qpr ON qpr.qm_permission_id = ppr.qm_permission_id UNION SELECT u.user_id,u.user_name,u.my_team_id,qpr.permission_id FROM user u INNER JOIN user_qm_permission_re uqpr ON uqpr.user_id = u.user_id INNER JOIN qm_permission_re qpr ON qpr.qm_permission_id = uqpr.qm_permission_id) t1 WHERE my_team_id = #{myTeamId} AND permission_id = #{permissionId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO qm_branch_goods (branch_id, goods_id, standard_id, standard_count) VALUES (#{branchId},#{goods.goodsId},#{goods.standardId},#{goods.standardCount})
mapper.select: SELECT im.image_path FROM image_space im INNER JOIN goods_image gi ON gi.image_id = im.image_id WHERE gi.goods_img_type = 1 AND gi.goods_id = #{goodsId} LIMIT 1
SELECT gt.goods_type_name FROM goods_typeinfo gt INNER JOIN goodsinfo gi ON gt.goods_type_id = gi.goods_type_id WHERE gi.goods_id = #{goodsId}
SELECT qb.branch_id FROM qm_branch qb INNER JOIN user u ON u.team_department_id = qb.department_id WHERE u.user_id = #{userId}
